text: DXSN (1017 kHz Surigao City) Radyo Magbalantay is an AM radio station owned and operated by Silangan Broadcasting Corporation, the media arm of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Surigao. Its studio is located at Magallanes Street, Surigao City. It is one of the pioneer stations of Northeastern Mindanao.Surigao Norte GADCC joins National Womens Month CelebrationSurigao radioman survives attackDSWD Caraga Meets Surigao City PressRadio commentator ambushed in Surigao ==References== Category:Radio stations in Surigao del Norte Category:Radio stations established in 1971 Category:News and talk radio stations in the Philippines
title: DXSN
